data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: ""A picture is worth a thousand words" is a common saying. Explain what this expression means and why you agree or disagree. Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: As this is the first time I see this expression, I suppose its meaning would be that a good picture taken by an excellent photographer has the ability to convey the meaning of a thousand words. Personally, I totally agree with this statement. This is because when the photographer was taking the picture, he or she was planning to tell the potential viewer a meaningful story by capturing an impressive moment using specific techniques. Say, a picture of the poor can vividly depict the hardship those people are experiencing, and hence induce viewers’ deep empathy, which, by words, would probably require more than a thousand words. （107 字）
